tool_description: PUBG API for all PUBG items such as weapons, ammo, maps, consumables, etc.
name: PUBG APIS
title: PUBG APIS

api_list.name: All Gun Category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com/cat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
